import React from 'react'; import { PageContainer, PageTitleOne, PageTitleTwo, PageText, PageAnchorTag } from '../global-page-styles/global-page-styles'; import { CustomButton } from '../../components/custom-button/custom-button.component'; import {Helmet} from "react-helmet"; const AboutPage = (props) =>{ return ( About About Description Dale Street Studio is a production, mixing & mastering studio. Owned and operated by musician & Dj, Marcus D. Norwood. I'm a producer at heart but I'm now also offering mixing and mastering services to new potential clients. I absolutely love audio in general and have been doing it for 21 years. Becoming a sort of Unicorn in the process due to the hobbyist nature I've kept. Now I am starting to finally offer professional audio services in 2021 and beyond. Booking Book for audio services. 1 free master per new client. Revisions included in mix or mastering services.
📩Book Audio Services
DjDefinitionBeats.com I once was a professional Dj/turntablist who went by the stagename of Dj Definition. I'm bringing back the name, not for Dj'ing clubs or anything like that, but as a producer and beat smith. Which I've never stopped doing on the side. Constantly making music. This is now a new hub for beats that I don't use for personal projects. Now offering them as Beat Leases/Licenses through the that store. I've also embedded the player and store into Dale Street Studio for quick access and listening.
📩Book Audio Services
Web Services I've also spent 12 years as a web developer & designer. This custom React + Firebase site was created custom as a hub to branch out to all of my Dale Street Studio, LLC ventures. See the Web Services site for more information on design, development & support services. I'm primarily focused on audio projects with Dale Street Studio, LLC now, but if the right client comes along I'd be more than happy to help build something new and help support their web needs.
📩See Web Services
BeatStyle Fashion & Apparel (coming soon) BeatStyle Fashion & Apparel is a new eComm merchandise brand I'm currently in the process of starting with a premium domain I've aquired. BeatStyle.com The store is currently not active, nor is the URL, as I get the merchandise foundation built and legal processes worked out. This will be just one of the entities that Dale Street Studio, LLC manages under a seperate DBA Tradename. ) }; export default React.memo(AboutPage);
